ValidationRule.description: This will require the event rating to be populated if the Event Status is Completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = false,
ISPICKVAL(Event_Status__c, 'Completed'), ISBLANK(TEXT(Event_Rating__c)),
or(isnew(), ischanged(Event_Status__c), ischanged(Event_Rating__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Event Rating is required when Event Status is Completed.
